channel.title: Learning to build new model using machine learning algorithms for better prediction of the future possibilities on Vimal | AIML Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Learning to build new model using machine learning algorithms for better prediction of the future possibilities on Vimal | AIML Portfolio

item.title: AIRBNB ROOM COST PREDICTION
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET Since 2008, guests and hosts have used Airbnb to expand on traveling possibilities and present more unique, personalized way of experiencing the world.

item.title: Parkison disease
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET Parkinson’s Disease (PD) is a degenerative neurological disorder marked by decreased dopamine levels in the brain. It manifests itself through a deterioration of movement, including the presence of tremors and stiffness.

item.title: FACEBOOK ANALYSIS
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET The data is related to posts' published during the year of 2014 on the Facebook’s page of a renowned cosmetics brand. CITATION

item.title: BANK
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET This case is about a bank (Thera Bank) whose management wants to explore ways of converting its liability customers to personal loan customers (while retaining them as depositors).

item.title: AMAZON RECOMMENDATION SYSTEM
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET Everyday a million products are being recommended to users based on popularity and other metrics on e-commerce websites. The most popular e-commerce website boosts average order value by 50%, increases revenues by 300%, and improves conversion.

item.title: Concrete strength
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET The actual concrete compressive strength (MPa) for a given mixture under a specific age (days) was determined from laboratory. Data is in raw form (not scaled).

item.title: Face Recognition
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET Aligned Face Dataset from Pinterest. This dataset contains 10,770 images for 100 people. All images are taken from ‘Pinterest’ and aligned using dlib library.

item.title: Google Street View images
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET SVHN is a real-world image dataset for developing machine learning and object recognition algorithms with the minimal requirement on data formatting but comes from a significantly harder, unsolved, real-world problem (recognizing digits and numbers in natural scene images).

item.title: IMDB Movie Reviews
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET The Dataset of 50,000 movie reviews from IMDB, labelled by sentiment (positive/negative). Reviews have been preprocessed, and each review is encoded as a sequence of word indexes (integers).

item.title: Netflix stock price VS Dow jones index
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET I used the Dow Jones Industrial Average to compare the Netflix stock to the later stock market. ACKNOWLEDGEMENT This dataset was provided to me for capstone project at codecademy.

item.title: Red Wine Quality
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET The two datasets are related to red and white variants of the Portuguese “Vinho Verde” wine. CITATION Paulo Cortez, University of Minho, Guimarães, Portugal website

item.title: SARCASM DETECTION
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET Past studies in Sarcasm Detection mostly make use of Twitter datasets collected using hashtag based supervision but such datasets are noisy in terms of labels and language.

item.title: Segmentation
item.description: ABOUT THE DATASET WIDER Face Dataset WIDER FACE dataset is a face detection benchmark dataset, of which images are selected from the publicly available WIDER dataset.
